title: Bushwacker
author: Nikki Webb
description: I give credit for this one to Nikki, though it's not her invention.  This is a cross between a Pi√±a colada and a chocolate milkshake that we first discovered down in the Keys.

ingredients.notes: This is a coconut syrup from the booze aisle, not remotely the same as coconut milk.

instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth.
Optionally: garnish with shaved chocolate or grated nutmeg.
notes: Single servings work fine in a personal blender - just halve the ingredients.
